meanings: (수량·정도·체중 등이) (수량·정도 등이) grow, increase, rise, swell; (시간·기간 등이) be extended; (체중이) gain (weight)
(능력·실력 등이) (사물 주어) improve; (사람 주어) make progress, get better
develop much of a talent for music
(수량이) go on increasing[growing, swelling], be on the increase

meanings.meaning: go into one's dance[dog and pony show, song and dance]
